DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf01Subtitle: *General, the GLA managed to defeat the US forces in this area. We launched a devastating counter attack, but like roaches they are still alive
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf02Subtitle: *Even now the GLA survivors are rebuilding
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf03Subtitle: *To finally eliminate the GLA we must send in our forces and root them out of every dark corner in which they hide
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf04Subtitle: *General, our new Listening Outposts are stationed in the area. They are at your disposal
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf05Subtitle: *The Listening Outpost itself is unarmed, however its passengers can fire on enemies that venture too close. You will find its long sight range and stealth ability greatly enhances battlefield awareness
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat01Subtitle: *No GLA will slip past our garrison
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat02Subtitle: *Toxin Tractors! They're trying to poison us all... we need support!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat03Subtitle: *Look... Oil Derricks... should we capture them?
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat04Subtitle: *GLA in your home? Apply a little fire... no more GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat05Subtitle: *The GLA are rebuilding over there... stand ready to attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat06Subtitle: *We will win this day... everyone advance...
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin01aSubtitle: *I did not think the United States would be defeated so easily
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin01bSubtitle: *I do not understand why the United States has allowed this to happen
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin01cSubtitle: *This can not be allowed to stand. China will make things right
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin01dSubtitle: *The GLA's treacherous use of our resources against the Americans has caused great embarassment to China. They must pay for their insolence
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin02Subtitle: *The missiles are prepared and ready for launch... final countdown started
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin04Subtitle: *They believe they have won the day, but they celebrate too soon
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin05Subtitle: *It is pretty when used for the right reasons...
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin06Subtitle: *GLA survivors are running to town for cover... they must be stopped!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin07Subtitle: *We are in position... bomb bay doors open...
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin08Subtitle: *We have spotted survivors. Ground assault will be necessary
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO01Subtitle: *General, our former base in the region was overrun by the GLA. You will need to construct a new base before you can engage the enemy
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO02Subtitle: *May I suggest that you garrison several of the nearby buildings to defend our base
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO03Subtitle: *General, the GLA has garrisoned several buildings throughout the town. Perhaps you could use a Dragon tank to clear out those garrisons
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO04Subtitle: *General, the GLA is moving Toxin Tractors towards our garrisoned buildings. If those tractors attack those buildings, everyone inside will be eliminated
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO05Subtitle: *The GLA are using these Oil Derricks to fund their forces. One of our Red Guard could capture those derricks. The proceeds would help defeat the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO06Subtitle: *General, is it wise to destroy these Oil Derricks? They would provide valuable resources for us. One of our Red Guard could capture them
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO07Subtitle: *You have caught them off-guard, General. One of your Red Guard could capture their buildings before they are able to respond
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO08Subtitle: *Now that you have re-established our base of operations, it is time to root out all remaining GLA forces in the area
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO09Subtitle: *Congratulations, General. You have freed the town of all GLA forces. Once you have wiped out their final base, your mission will be complete
DIALOGEVENT:MisChi02Lin13Subtitle: *The Terrorist threat is finished. Good work, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf01Subtitle: *General, the GLA are attempting to steal the nuclear warheads stored at this facility
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf01aSubtitle: *General, the GLA are attempting to destroy our main nuclear power plant
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf02Subtitle: *Our brave soldiers held off their attack but at great cost and the GLA is still out there
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf03Subtitle: *You must hold off the GLA and insure that every one of our Bunkers is protected
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf03aSubtitle: *You must hold off the GLA to insure that the facility is not destroyed
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf04Subtitle: *We have several new technologies that should be of great benefit to your mission, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf05Subtitle: *Our Nuclear Cannons are now upgraded to fire neutron shells. These new shells effectively eliminate soldiers and vehicle drivers. Once the radiation has cleared, one of our infantrymen can then capture the surviving vehicles
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf06Subtitle: *Our buildings can now upgrade to Neutron mines. While still effective against infantry, they will also temporarily incapacitate enemy vehicles
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf07aSubtitle: *General, your reinforcements will arrive in 15 minutes
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf07bSubtitle: *General, your reinforcements will arrive in 10 minutes
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf07cSubtitle: *General, your reinforcements will arrive in 5 minutes
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat01Subtitle: *Enemy forces sighted. We will hold them back
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat02Subtitle: *We're taking fire on the right flank... support is needed here
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat03Subtitle: *They are behind us... direct all fire to the south!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat04Subtitle: *GLA base in range... all teams ready to attack, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat05Subtitle: *Enemy buildings on that ridge. Give the word, General, and we will roll over them
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat06Subtitle: *Watch those RPG Troopers! We need help!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat07Subtitle: *General, we are over the target area now and have commenced bombing
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat08Subtitle: *Rolling out the carpet... of bombs. Heheh
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat09Subtitle: *Enemy air defenses are thick here... we are taking heavy damage
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat10Subtitle: *Stinger sites have locked onto us... we are in trouble!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat11Subtitle: *Stop that Rebel, he's trying to capture our bunker!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat12Subtitle: *It isn't a Battlemaster, but it will have to do
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat16Subtitle: *Now we will show them how to attack a base!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat17Subtitle: *Reinforcements! We are glad to see you!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat18Subtitle: *We are ready for your orders, General. Where do you need us?
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01Subtitle: *We must be on our guard. Reports say the GLA might attack as revenge for our entering the war
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01aSubtitle: *I don't feel safe guarding this nuclear plant
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01bSubtitle: *Yah. I wish I had joined up with the air force instead
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01dSubtitle: *Surely after our recent victory they would not dare to attack us here
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01cSubtitle: *Their food is much better. And they get to wear those fancy helmets
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin04aSubtitle: *Another wave! They've got bomb trucks and terrorists! We need reinforcements!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin04bSubtitle: *Another wave! They're using suicide tactics! Where are those reinforcements?!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin06Subtitle: *They're trying to get to the storage bunkers! Protect them at all costs!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin06aSubtitle: *They're trying to get to the main reactor! Protect it at all costs!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin07Subtitle: *The Command Center... they got the Command Center
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin09Subtitle: *Not much left. We're going to need reinforcements
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin10Subtitle: *The message got through, but we'll have to hold until they get here
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO02Subtitle: *General, GLA forces are attacking the bunkers
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO02aSubtitle: *General, GLA forces are attacking the nuclear plant!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO03Subtitle: *The GLA is attempting to capture one of our bunkers
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO04Subtitle: *General, this bunker is badly damaged. May I suggest it be repaired before another GLA attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO04aSubtitle: *General, our nuclear plant is badly damaged. May I suggest it be repaired before another GLA attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO05Subtitle: *General, that last attack severely weakened several bunkers. If one of them is destroyed, the GLA will win this encounter
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO05aSubtitle: *General, that last attack severly weakened the nuclear plant. If it is destroyed, we will fail our mission!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO06Subtitle: *Warning... GLA forces moving towards the bunkers
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO06aSubtitle: *Warning... GLA forces are moving towards the power plant!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO07Subtitle: *General, I've made contact with one of our spy outposts. They are under GLA attack. If we can rescue them, I can patch into their system and we will be able to call in carpet bombers
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO08Subtitle: *General, if you can secure that spy outpost, it will allow you to direct carpet bombing runs on the GLA forces
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO09Subtitle: *General, now that our reinforcements have arrived it is time to eliminate the GLA from this area
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf01Subtitle: *Greetings, General. Now that we have thwarted the GLA's counterattack, it is time to press our advantage!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf02Subtitle: *We must liberate this town from the GLA's clutches
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf03Subtitle: *There is a very heavily defended GLA base north of the river. We must destroy it, but it will not be an easy task
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf04Subtitle: *Our operations have attracted much attention from the rest of the world, and we will be watched closely. The longer this battle goes on, the lower our International Opinion will fall
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf05Subtitle: *Damage to civilian property must be avoided. Our operation must be precise, and swift. Destruction of GLA forces will cause International Opinion to rise, in our favor
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf09Subtitle: *If our International Opinion becomes high enough, the people of the town might join our cause
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf10Subtitle: *It will then be easy to annihilate the GLA's defenses
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat01Subtitle: *They must have a camouflaged Tunnel Network near here...
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat05Subtitle: *They are coming from the far side of the lake
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat06Subtitle: *Their troops must be hidden in the forest
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat12Subtitle: *The people are too afraid to come out from their homes
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat13Subtitle: *We must free them from this oppression!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO10Subtitle: *General. Destroying the GLA statues will be critical to increasing our International Opinion and will boost support of our efforts amongst the population
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO11Subtitle: *They have dispatched a Toxic Tractor to clear our garrisonned structures!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO12Subtitle: *Our Dragon Tanks will be a high priority target... guard them well
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO13Subtitle: *Well done, sir. The destruction of the statue has caused world opinion to rise
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO16Subtitle: *Do not let them destroy the buildings!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO17Subtitle: *Use the Neutron Shell to clear buildings without damaging them
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO18Subtitle: *Beware! Their defensive structures are hidden with camo-netting
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO19Subtitle: *General, the GLA have the city well-defended. We need to clear them out
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO20Subtitle: *You're making good progress, General. Much of the city is now free of GLA control
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO21Subtitle: *Sir! The city is rising up against our foes!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO22Subtitle: *General, we must clear the GLA from this area!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO23Subtitle: *Our International Opinion is high. Great work!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat01Subtitle: *They have almost escaped! We must stop them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat010Subtitle: *They are skirting the lake. Intercept them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat012Subtitle: *We have stopped the first wave of GLA!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat013Subtitle: *Again we have put them in their place!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat014Subtitle: *No one can stand to the might of China!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat018Subtitle: *We will banish them from the skies!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat03Subtitle: *We cannot let them get past that hill
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat04Subtitle: *They will surely pass by here. We should defend this area
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat15Subtitle: *Our forces are in position. We are ready for anything
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat16Subtitle: *They are stronger than we thought. We need air support. Send in the Helix now!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO01Subtitle: *The GLA is sending forth another wave!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO02Subtitle: *This wave is retreating towards the north
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO04Subtitle: *This wave is retreating to the east
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO05Subtitle: *The European Union is extremely pleased with our performance, General. We need to stay aggressive and eliminate the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO07Subtitle: *General, they have a scud storm! We must spread out our troops to deny them a target!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO09Subtitle: *The GLA have no honor! They have decimated the village to clear a path!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO10Subtitle: *We should assemble a base to secure this region
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO11Subtitle: *Our Helix is the Overlord of the skies. Build more to help us control the area
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO12Subtitle: *Sir, I recommend placing Listening Outposts at key locations
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO13Subtitle: *Current Intel reports that the GLA are retreating towards this location. We will make our stand here. Do not permit any GLA units to leave this area. Our new Helix Helicopter should assure your success. The appearance of our forces from the south will signal the completion of your main objective
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO14Subtitle: *Current Intel reports that the GLA are retreating towards this location. We will make our stand here. Do not permit any GLA units to leave this area. If too many of them escape, our mission will be a failure. Our new Helix Helicopter should assure your success. The appearance of our forces from the south will signal the completion of your main objective
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO15Subtitle: *A wave of GLA is approaching from the west
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO16Subtitle: *There is a wave of GLA approaching from the south
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO17Subtitle: *GLA forces have been spotted approaching from the southwest
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO19Subtitle: *A wave of GLA forces are approaching from the southwest
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO21Subtitle: *Excellent work, sir. Intel confirms that you have destroyed the entire wave
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO22Subtitle: *The enemy is about to breach our defenses
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO24Subtitle: *Our defenses have been breached, General, we have failed the mission
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO25Subtitle: *General, our forces from the south have arrived. Our mission was a success
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO26Subtitle: *General, enemy forces are dangerously close to making their escape. We must deal with them quickly!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO27Subtitle: *GLA forces have been detected fleeing through this location. Move into defensive positions and await enemy contact
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO28Subtitle: *General, Wave 1 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO29Subtitle: *General, Wave 2 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO30Subtitle: *General, Wave 3 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO31Subtitle: *General, Wave 4 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO32Subtitle: *General, Wave 5 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO33Subtitle: *Our forces have arrived from the south. You have been successful in preventing the enemy retreat. Good job General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO34Subtitle: *General, the enemy forces have escaped to the North. We have failed the mission
DIALOGEVENT:MisChi05OfficerC01Subtitle: *It's time we corrected our mistake. Kill them all!
DIALOGEVENT:MisChi05OfficerC02Subtitle: *Let us flush these rats from their holes. Death to the cowards!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf01Subtitle: *Thanks to your remarkable efforts in Halberstadt the GLA are all but finished. US intel has located the last GLA stronghold outside of Hamburg. Unfortunately we were too late to help the Americans in this area and the GLA captured their base. Build your forces and destroy both the GLA and US bases
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf02Subtitle: *The GLA have captured an old US base in the region and are building up. Your Final Objective is to Destroy both the US and GLA bases
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf03Subtitle: *The GLA have increased their stealth abilities, General. They can now stealth just about anything. We'll need to stay alert
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf04Subtitle: *Use your Listening Outposts to detect stealthed units
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf05Subtitle: *General, I suggest you first concentrate your attack on the US base. We need to take out their Particle Cannons
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xChat01Subtitle: *It feels like we are on an Easter Egg hunt, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin01Subtitle: *Corporal! Any sign of the Chinese yet?
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin02Subtitle: *No sir, the last message received was at 02:00... nothing since
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin03Subtitle: *Well, I hope they get here soon. Our intel points to a full-scale GLA attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin07Subtitle: *Our base has been breached... all units to your stations! Where are those Chinese we were promised!?
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin08Subtitle: *Fox in the hole! Fox in the hole!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin10Subtitle: *They're capturing our buildings! We can't hold! All units, fall back! Repeat, fall back!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO01Subtitle: *That's it! Power to the US base is down! Finish them quickly before they can rebuild!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO02Subtitle: *Well done, General. The enemy can no longer produce US units
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO03Subtitle: *Well done, General. The enemy can no longer produce GLA units
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO04Subtitle: *Well done, General. The US base has been neutralized. Destroy the GLA base to finish this battle
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO05Subtitle: *Well done, General. The GLA base has been neutralized. Destroy the US base to finish this battle
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO06Subtitle: *We must finish what the US was not able to do. The GLA must fall and the world will be at peace
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO07Subtitle: *If we are able to defeat the GLA and save Europe from its clutches then there are great rewards to be had
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO08Subtitle: *General, you will take your place among China's finest heroes. The GLA has fallen and China is the shining beacon in a new world. Take you place of honor and bask in the glory that is China
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO09Subtitle: *General, the enemy has improved their stealth ability, but they do not appear to be using tanks
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO10Subtitle: *General, the GLA commander is lacking tanks. Perhaps we can overwhelm him with our forces
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO11Subtitle: *General, we are losing vehicles to Jarmen Kell. You must track him down if we are to stand a chance
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO12Subtitle: *General, the enemy is using HIJACKERS! We need to stop them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO13Subtitle: *General, the enemy has positioned SNIPERs in the local villages. We must clear them out
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO14Subtitle: *General, we are losing troops to the enemy's Quad Cannons, we need heavy armour out here
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO15Subtitle: *General, current intel suggests Jarmen Kell may be holed up in this small village
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO16Subtitle: *General, the enemy's base seems to be on the other side of this river. Perhaps we can lock him in by positioning forces near the bridges
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO17Subtitle: *General, we have many driverless vehicles in the field... send units to recapture them
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO18Subtitle: *Sir! We have detected Battle buses in sector C. We should deal with them before they can reach our base
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO19Subtitle: *General, the enemy has slipped units into our base! We should improve our defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO20Subtitle: *General, the enemy has infiltrated our base!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO21Subtitle: *General! Taking out the American Command Center will put a stop to his heavy Air support
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO22Subtitle: *General, we need to get our INTERNET CENTER built as quickly as possible. It will help us locate enemy positions
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO23Subtitle: *General, the enemy has left his Flank unguarded! Now is our chance to counter attack!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO24Subtitle: *General, the Americans have superior stealth detection technology. Perhaps you should capture this base instead of destroying it
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01Scorpion108Subtitle: *We have found a secret way. It's poorly guarded
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat02Subtitle: *Enemy position spotted! We must find a way past them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat04Subtitle: *American Sentry Drones! We must destroy them quickly before they sound the alarm!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat05Subtitle: *Look at them scramble! Our attack was a complete surprise!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat06Subtitle: *American attackers closing in! We must hold our position, General!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat07Subtitle: *Our surprise was complete! All units, concentrate on their power plants!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin01Subtitle: *Patrol to base: Target has been located and we are in pursuit
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin02Subtitle: *Be advised, the bombing campaign has already begun. Be careful, Patrol
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin03Subtitle: *Roger that, base. I'm on the right
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin08Subtitle: *Base! Charlie three is down! Repeat: Charlie three is down!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin09Subtitle: *Continue pursuit, Charlie two! This is our best shot at him!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin12Subtitle: *Heh heh. General, we've made our escape.and are headed for the rendevouz point. The GLA shall rise again
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin14Subtitle: *This is scout team. We detect no enemy presence. Wait...
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin16Subtitle: *Sentry Drones! These Americans are most clever. Their drones are hidden when they are still. You must proceed with caution, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen01Subtitle: *The Americans have surrounded our stronghold with military checkpoints. You must clear the way
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen02Subtitle: *General, you must help our true leader escape, so that the GLA can live on
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen03Subtitle: *Dr. Thrax may have died for the cause but he was inconsequential. If our brother escapes the US will not have seen the last of the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen04Subtitle: *General. The Fire Base defenses around this American position are too strong. We should avoid a direct confrontation and find another way into the base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen05Subtitle: *Hold you forces back, General. We are sending in a team to scout the other side of the bridge. They will report back on enemy positions
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen06Subtitle: *My General. One of our Quick Strike teams has managed to elude their American pursuers, and have agreed to aid us in our mission. Their rocket pods should prove most useful against enemy armor
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen07Subtitle: *We have discovered one of our demolitions teams. They will help us to clear a path by destroying the outlying US support bases
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen08Subtitle: *General. We must secure the airfield before the transport plane arrives. The survival of the GLA depends on your success
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen09Subtitle: *Our Combat Cycles are very versatile. They enhance the abilities of our loyal footsoldiers, and are able to travel over rough terrain. They are even able to survive a jump off cliffs. Use them to bypass American strongpoints and attack their vulnerable sides
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen10Subtitle: *General! The Americans have sent a second group of pursuers to capture our leader. Protect him at all costs!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen11Subtitle: *General, this hidden base can provide us with the resources we need to push past the American siege and reach the airfield
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen12Subtitle: *General, our leader is under attack! He must not fall to the Americans!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen13Subtitle: *General, your forces are moving too far ahead of our leader. Remember that he must reach the airfield if our cause is to survive
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen14Subtitle: *Another American base. It must be eliminated. Be wary of their Fire Bases, sir
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen15Subtitle: *We are within reach of the airfield, General. Destroy the American forces and secure the area that we may fly our leader to safety
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen16Subtitle: *Well done, General. With you in command, we can not fail
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen17Subtitle: *We have reached the airfield, sir. Make sure our leader is ready and waiting at the air strip when his plane arrives
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen18Subtitle: *Our plane is on approach, General! Just hold your position for a little longer. Our leader must survive to board that plane!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen19Subtitle: *The plane has arrived. Load our leader in so that we may fly him to safety and regroup
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen20Subtitle: *The plane is waiting for our leader to board. Make haste and bring him in, General. Our forces cannot hold out indefinitely against the Americans
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen21Subtitle: *Our operative, Jarmen Kell, has been harrassing the American supply lines. He will be of great help to our mission, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen22Subtitle: *Excellent work, General. We will show the Americans that we still have the power to resist them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen23Subtitle: *We have discovered an advance scout force, General. They have offered to aid us with our mission
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen24Subtitle: *General! Take out the American power plants to shut down their base defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen25Subtitle: *Our forces have been weakened, General. We must choose our battles more wisely
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02Chatter04Subtitle: *We are here and ready for your command
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xChat02Subtitle: *The resistance is too strong, there must be another way
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xChat03Subtitle: *The Prince must be stopped. The GLA must not fall to him!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xChat07Subtitle: *We must rebuild our Arms Dealer quickly
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin01Subtitle: *This is Recon 1 to base. I am finishing my patrol. Sector is clear
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin02Subtitle: *This is base. Are you certain, Recon 1? We've had reports of troop movements linked to Prince Kassad
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin03Subtitle: *I am most certain. I haven't seen anything but dust and shrubs for hours now. Returning to base after this
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin05Subtitle: *Recon 1 to base! Enemy contact! Repeat, enemy contact!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin08Subtitle: *Recon 1, what is your status? Recon 1! Report!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin09Subtitle: *Once Prince Kassad is removed the GLA will be under our control. Then vengeance will be ours and the American infidels will burn
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin10Subtitle: *Prince Kassad is beginning to take control whereever he can. We must put an end to his vie for power
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen01Subtitle: *General, our resources are running low -- we must find a new source of supplies!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen02Subtitle: *Kassad is attempting to capture nearby resources! We must not let him take what is righfully ours!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen03Subtitle: *We must reunite the GLA under one leader!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen04Subtitle: *Beware! Kassad has launched a sneak attack against us!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen05Subtitle: *We have much bigger plans than that rat Kassad. The world will quake as we unleash the fury of the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen06Subtitle: *We have acquired GPS Scramble technology! Now we can use Kassad's tricks against him!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen07Subtitle: *Excellent, General! We have secured the Sneak Attack ability!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen09Subtitle: *If we can capture the enemy Command Center we can use their technology against them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen10Subtitle: *General, we must capture their Command Center and use their knowledge to progress towards our goal of uniting the GLA under one flag
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen11Subtitle: *We are running low on resources. We must capture some oil derricks
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen12Subtitle: *Our enemy is attacking our Oil Supply! They must be stopped!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen13Subtitle: *Use the GPS scramble to sneak past the enemy defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen14Subtitle: *The GPS Scramble will not work here, there are too many Stinger Sites.We will need to use a different tactic
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen15Subtitle: *Perhaps we can find an unguarded area to use our new Sneak Attack ability
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen16Subtitle: *Do not destroy the Command Center. We need to capture the structure and keep it intact
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen17Subtitle: *Their knowledge must be stolen. We need to use their advanced tactics to defeat them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen18Subtitle: *General, be wary of snipers -- Kassad loves to use them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen19Subtitle: *This bridge is heavily defended. We will need assistance in getting across it
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen20Subtitle: *Capture the enemy Command Center to the North!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen21Subtitle: *Capture the enemy Command Center to the West!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen22Subtitle: *General, if we capture this cannon, we can use it against Kassad's forces!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen23Subtitle: *If we capture the Command Center, we can use their abilities to turn the tide of this battle
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen24Subtitle: *Prince Kassad is no more. The GLA are once again united against our enemies!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen25Subtitle: *Now that we have GPS scramble, we can move unseen past Kassad's bridge defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen26Subtitle: *The traitor has fortified himself on this hilltop and cut all other means of access. Sneak Attack is the only way we have to strike at his main base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen27Subtitle: *General, this area is being controlled by Prince Kassad. He has turned his back on his brethren and will not aid us in our cause against the infidels
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen28Subtitle: *Kassad is a master of stealth, hiding his forces in plain sight. He refuses to share his knowledge with us, so we will take it from him
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen29Subtitle: *A GLA splinter cell commanded by Prince Kassad is controlling this area. Kassad refuses to let us use his abilities for the good of the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen30Subtitle: *Kassad is a master of stealth, relying on several techniques to surprise and attack his enemies
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen31Subtitle: *GPS scramble gives him the power to have any unit strike unseen against an enemy
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen32Subtitle: *Tunnel sneak attacks offer further tactical advantages...
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen33Subtitle: *We must have these technologies. If Kassad will not share, we will take them from him. Capture his command centers and turn his own abilities against him!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03Kenwar15Subtitle: *We have spotted a Prison Camp, our brothers are held inside
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf02Subtitle: *Kassad was too cowardly to make an attempt against the US such as this. General, you are truly a master mind
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf03Subtitle: *Once the US Mediterranean naval force is shattered all of Europe will be in our grasp
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf04Subtitle: *Now that we are again united, it is time to make our strength felt!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf05Subtitle: *The USA has attacked our secret base in the Mediterranean
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf06Subtitle: *But before it was wiped out, we learned of the location of their Particle Cannon and naval fleet in the region
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf07Subtitle: *Most of their ships are in port and helpless. We will steal their Particle Cannon and use it to take out their Aircraft Carrier!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xBrf08Subtitle: *Look for an opportunity to reclaim and rebuild our secret base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xChat06Subtitle: *We have them where we want them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xCin02Subtitle: *Their carrier will be turned into scrap!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xCin03Subtitle: *We have proven the might of the GLA!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen01Subtitle: *Our Hijackers could take that tank easily...
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen02Subtitle: *That Ranger is running for help! We must not let him get away
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen03Subtitle: *We'll need this Particle Cannon to sink the enemy Carrier. Defend it well!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen04Subtitle: *Our rebels can use their Capture Building ability to take control of the Particle Cannon
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen05Subtitle: *We can use our Sneak Attack to create Tunnel Networks on nearby islands
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen06Subtitle: *We must not let the pilot reach his Tomahawk!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen10Subtitle: *This Arms Dealer will serve us well
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen12Subtitle: *General, do you see those enemy supply planes? If we could destroy their drop zones, we would cripple their production!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen13Subtitle: *Ah, this toxic tractor will come in handy
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen14Subtitle: *These Quad Cannons will defend us from enemy aircraft
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen16Subtitle: *Destroy these tanks and we can liberate the Barracks!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA03xKen17Subtitle: *If we clear this area, we can safely occupy the Command Center

DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xCin30Subtitle: *We've got GLA inside city limits! All units converge on coordinates 34AlphaAlpha

DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen03Subtitle: *Good job, General! Only 5 more toxin samples to be retrieved
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen04Subtitle: *General, we have a plan to attack America's Central Command in Europe. But we do not yet have the power to strike at them directly. We need a new toxin weapon

DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA04xKen24Subtitle: *Another cel of rebels has arrived to support our cause
