DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBrf04Subtitle: *Once she has completed her download, Col Burton must bring the mountainside down on the lab and bury it forever
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton01Subtitle: *We're at the bridge. Lotus, take care of that Scorpion, I'll deal with the other guards
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton02Subtitle: *That wasn't part of the plan, Lotus
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton03Subtitle: *You'll wait for me? All right, Lotus, let's race...
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton05Subtitle: *All right, I see the POW camp... looks like they have a Tunnel Network that passes under the river
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton06Subtitle: *Nice work, Lotus... Tunnels down here... just take care of a couple guards and I'll have everyone freed
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton07Subtitle: *Those vehicles would come in handy if the intel about the defenses around the mountains are correct. General, we ought to rescue them, too
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton08Subtitle: *General, I'm in position near the second POW Camp... there's a Tunnel Network and guards out front. I could slip past them into the compound if I climbed down the cliffs on the south end of the camp
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton09Subtitle: *Don't get cocky, Lotus, you haven't won this race yet
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton10Subtitle: *That's the last of them... second POW Camp is secured... someone should tell Lotus to hurry up... I don't want to be kept waiting at the Lab
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton11Subtitle: *That's some new toy. General, if you focus it at those Tunnel Networks and Stinger Sites guarding the mountain, I'll slip right by them
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton12Subtitle: *Looks like a whole GLA base. Intel never said anthing about this being here
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton13Subtitle: *Doesn't look like they were expecting me... a little C4 here and there and I'll make short work of this place... just say the word, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton14Subtitle: *I should be safe moving through the village... just need to watch out for any Radar Vans monitoring the area. Wish I had a couple Flash Bangs
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton15Subtitle: *This is it! I'm moving into position above the Lab... don't keep me waiting Lotus, its cold up here
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton17Subtitle: *Well, Lotus, you're fast... I'll give you that. I'll be there as soon as I can
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xBurton18Subtitle: *Alright... I'm at the mountain... Tell me when your download finishes, Lotus, and I'll bury that lab where no one will ever find it again
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xChat02Subtitle: *There they are... remember, short controlled bursts
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xChat04Subtitle: *We're taking fire... we need some support here!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xCin01Subtitle: *This is Spirit, I am rolling in over the target area...
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xCin02Subtitle: *Roger, Spirit, mission is go. You ready to do this?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xCin04Subtitle: *This is Spirit, bomb bay doors open... bombs are away
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xCin05Subtitle: *Spirit to Infiltrator, your LZ is clear... Good Luck
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xCin08Subtitle: *Thanks for the lift boys... see you soon...
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xCin09Subtitle: *Your small Chinooks are efficient... but I prefer the strength of our Helixes...
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva01Subtitle: *General, your first objective is the destruction of this bridge. Its destruction will cut off GLA reinforcements from the other side of the river
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva02Subtitle: *General, GLA reinforcements have been sighted crossing the bridge
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva03Subtitle: *Another GLA squad has entered the area, General. Perhaps we should take care of that bridge now?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva04Subtitle: *General, it appears that there are several GLA Radar Vans in the area, if your forces get to close, they will be detected
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva05Subtitle: *Excellent job, General. Now you only need to worry about GLA forces on this side of the river
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva06Subtitle: *The GLA have a POW camp along the route Col Burton must take to the GLA Lab. If you free the men held there, Col Burton will have an easier time getting to the Lab
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva07Subtitle: *General, intel suggests you free the men at the POW camp before you send Col Burton too far away
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva08Subtitle: *Congratulations, General, I'm sure the families of those men will be happy to hear they've been rescued
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva09Subtitle: *General, the GLA's Lab is directly north of your current position. There are a number of GLA defenses still along your route... be careful
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva10Subtitle: *It appears that those Oil Derricks are the only source of income for the GLA base. If you can destroy them you will cripple the GLA here
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva12Subtitle: *General, the men you just rescued are driving our newest vehicle, the Microwave Tank
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva13Subtitle: *This vehicle has two modes: The first generates a continuous microwave field in front of the vehicle - very lethal to all infantry. The second allows it to disrupt the functions of any targeted building
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva14Subtitle: *General, the GLA know we are here and appear to be on heightened alert. Be careful when moving Col Burton into position above their Secret Lab
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva15Subtitle: *General, the GLA have upgraded their tank shells to contain poisons. Be careful.
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva16Subtitle: *I'm showing a GLA patrol in that village, General... as well as a number of enemy forces garrisoned throughout the village
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva17Subtitle: *Maybe Black Lotus can find out more Intel about who is behind the GLA WMD program
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xEva18Subtitle: *That was incredible General. Looks like the GLA won't be using that facility anymore... and it seems Black Lotus downloaded some vital info about the source of this lab. For now, let's regroup and see what she was able to find out. Great work
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus01Subtitle: *The scorpion is disabled... I will take care of matters across the river. Wait until I am across and then destroy the bridge
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus02Subtitle: *It is now. Don't worry, I'll wait for you at the lab... do hurry
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus03Subtitle: *General, I am in a position to help free your forces held prisoner. Perhaps Col. Burton would like to help?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus04Subtitle: *General, could you ask Col Burton to please hurry to the POW camp... I'm tired of waiting on him
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus05Subtitle: *I will draw the camp guards attention to this side of the river. That should let you and your pet robots handle the Tunnel and free your captured men
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus06Subtitle: *General... my forces are moving on the final GLA positions this side of the river. Please inform Col Burton that he should hurry... I would prefer not to wait too long for him to catch up
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus07Subtitle: *Please inform Col Burton that I shall be waiting for HIM at the Lab
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus08Subtitle: *I'm here, Colonel... you win. The GLA put up a stronger fight than I had anticipated. Beginning download
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus10Subtitle: *General. I am ready and waiting at the Lab... whenever the Colonel would like to arrive and finish this mission
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xLotus11Subtitle: *It is cold out here. You are coming aren't you Burton?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xRngr02Subtitle: *A couple of our men broke off to check out the village east of here before we were captured. They may still be over there
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xRngr03Subtitle: *Good to see you, General, we thought we were going to end up captured
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xRngr04Subtitle: *The rest of our team was captured just after we got to the village. General, we'd like to volunteer to rescue them
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA03xRngr05Subtitle: *General, a squad of vehicles was captured just after we were taken. The GLA are holding them in a camp just north of here
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Eva07Subtitle: *We need to clear out these Stinger Sites before we can bring in our bombers to clear the GLA from the area
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Eva08Subtitle: *Construction crews have arrived sir. You'll need to get our base setup before we're overrun by the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Eva09Subtitle: *Our final objective is this GLA base here, in the hills. Take it out, and the operation is complete
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Officer03Subtitle: *Terrorists detected. All units be on the alert
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Ranger01Subtitle: *Calling in GLA bunker location at grid square Beta Charlie 6-8-9er-4-4
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Transport01Subtitle: *Transport teams 1 and 2 approaching the landing zone
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04Transport03Subtitle: *Transport Team 1 reporting! Mission completed! I'm pulling out!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xBrf01Subtitle: *General, intelligence reports that the rogue forces behind this GLA splinter cell are commanded by Dr. Thrax
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xBrf02Subtitle: *Dr. Thrax is a wanted criminal... responsible for notorious terror crimes against the US military. He must be brought to justice
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xBrf03Subtitle: *Dr. Thrax was developing a brand new toxin at his secret mountain lab. Thank goodness Lotus and Burton were there to stop him
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xBrf04Subtitle: *Dr. Thrax is receiving his funding from his oil fields. We must cut off his flow of oil
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xBrf05Subtitle: *The Intel we retrieved from the Secret Lab proves the GLA have seized these oil fields to help fund the nefarious Dr. Thrax. They may destroy them, rather then let you recapture them. Beware General, the GLA have started using Booby Traps... use Dozers to remove BOOBY TRAPS safely
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat01Subtitle: *Sir! Toxin Tractors are eating us up! Send help!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat04Subtitle: *We're losing units to Quad Cannons, sir! Send armour!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat05Subtitle: * NO! Bravo Three was killed by a Quad Cannon, Sir!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat06Subtitle: *The enemy has started sending tanks, sir! Send Missile defenders!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat07Subtitle: *Ha! GLA tanks are no match for us!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat08Subtitle: *Sir, we're losing units to enemy Tanks!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat09Subtitle: *What's the enemy doing with those radar vans?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat11Subtitle: *Where are those car bombs coming from?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat12Subtitle: *Sir, we need more defenses out here! Car Bombs are tearing us up!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat14Subtitle: *Sir, we need better defenses against these Bomb Trucks!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat15Subtitle: *Sir, we've engaged angry mobs! Send anti-personel units!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat16Subtitle: *Angry mobs are destroying us! Send some snipers out here!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat17Subtitle: *Sir, we need to do something about these ANGRY MOBS!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat18Subtitle: *Sir, we're losing units to Terrorists, can we get a sniper out here?
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat19Subtitle: *Sir, these Terrorists are chewing us up! Send support!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat20Subtitle: *Jees! Whats with all these demo traps!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat21Subtitle: *Sir, this field is littered with Demo Traps! We need to clear them out!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat22Subtitle: *What?! We've lost a structure to a CAR BOMBER!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat23Subtitle: *Car Bombers are attacking us! The appear to be coming from the local town
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat24Subtitle: *Whoa! Those bomb trucks pack a punch!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat26Subtitle: *Sir, build more defenses to protect against the BOMB TRUCKS!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat28Subtitle: *Sir, we need a Pathfinder to deal with those ANGRY MOBS!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat29Subtitle: *Sir, we need anti-personel out out here NOW! These angry mobs are chewing us up!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat30Subtitle: *Sir, we've lost a building to a car bomb
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat31Subtitle: *Terrorists are destroying our buildings! Call in snipers!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xChat32Subtitle: *Sir! Their Bomb Trucks are destroying our base!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCIA01Subtitle: *Good to see some friendlies! Let's rock!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin01Subtitle: *Satcom, this is Charlie 5. Approaching TARGET, no hostiles sighted... wait... TARGET is in sight, Satcom... over
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin02Subtitle: *Roger that 5... You are a go, over
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin03Subtitle: *Roger Satcom... payload is away... leaving hotzone! Over
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin04Subtitle: *Roger that 5, out. Victor 3 you are go for IMMEDIATE drop... over
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin08Subtitle: *Careful not to get slimed, boys... chem weapons sighted
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin09Subtitle: *This is no MILK RUN, boys! Keep your heads!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin11Subtitle: *Goats are away. Retuning to barn. Out
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin12Subtitle: *Bravo team, your primary objective is the small airstrip to your South. Secure it for incoming reinforcements. Out
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xCin13Subtitle: *Roger Satcom, moving out. Listen up kids! This is a FREE FIRE ZONE! Watch for ROACHES! If it moves kill it
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva01Subtitle: *The GLA has started using BOOBY-TRAPS on structures in this area. They will explode if you try to capture or garrison them. Use Dozers to remove them
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva02Subtitle: *The GLA has siezed the nearby oil fields. Protect the derricks and destroy the GLA base
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva03Subtitle: *BE CAREFUL, General; the enemy may have set up traps in the oil field
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva04Subtitle: *Good news, General. Colonel Burton knows several covert operatives in this area. Lead Burton to the ops to solicit their help
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva05Subtitle: *Good news, General. There are several covert operatives in this area. Find them to solicit their help
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva06Subtitle: *Well done General, this region is now free of GLA troublemakers
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva07Subtitle: *Well done, General. This area has been secured
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva08Subtitle: *General, Your ultimate objective is to destroy the GLA base in this area. Your main source of funding will be the oil derricks. You must secure and protect them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva09Subtitle: *Well done, General. Your mission is a success
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva10Subtitle: *General, the local town is being poisoned by GLA propaganda and are launching attacks against us. Destroy the GLA radio station to quell the uprising
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva11Subtitle: *Destroy the GLA radio-station in the city to quell the uprising
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva12Subtitle: *Well done, General. The GLA propaganda machine has been destroyed
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva13Subtitle: *Destroy the GLA RADIO STATION in the city to stop the car-bomb attacks
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva14Subtitle: *Destroy the GLA RADIO STATION in the city to stop the bomb-truck attacks
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva15Subtitle: *Destroy the GLA RADIO STATION in the city to stop the suicide attacks
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva16Subtitle: *General, there are several ARTILLERY PLATFORMS in the area. Capture them for suppression fire
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva17Subtitle: *General, There is a REPAIR PAD in the area. Capture it to help heal our vehicles
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva18Subtitle: *Sir, please build more defenses to protect against the car bombers
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva19Subtitle: *Sir, the enemy has started deploying Radar Vans, they can spot our pathfinders!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva20Subtitle: *Sir, the enemy's Radar Vans are sweeping for our pathfinders... be careful
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva21Subtitle: *Sir, we should build Patriots to counter the bomb trucks
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva22Subtitle: *Sir, Enemy Terrorists are proving highly effective. I suggest you send Pathfinders
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva23Subtitle: *Sir! We're losing units to Demo Traps, please be more careful!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva24Subtitle: *General, There is an OIL REFINERY in the area. Capture it to reduce vehicle cost
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva25Subtitle: *Sir, the enemy has begun attacking the OIL FIELDS
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva30Subtitle: *General, our cash reserves are running low -- capture oil derricks for needed cash
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva33Subtitle: *All the oil derricks have been DESTROYED! Your mission is a failure
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA04xEva34Subtitle: *Your base has been destroyed! Your mission is a failure
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xChat01Subtitle: *Our base is being attacked sir. They built a tunnel network inside our base without us knowing
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xChat02Subtitle: *Those buses are loaded with hostiles sir! Watch out!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xChat03Subtitle: *Our base is being attacked sir. They built a tunnel network inside our base without us knowing
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xChat04Subtitle: *We offer you our assistance to rid us of this Toxin Monger. His obsession will kill us all and that we cannot allow
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xChat07Subtitle: *Thank you for releasing me. Transport me to my base in the East and I can help you
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xCin01Subtitle: *Sat-Com A4 has confirmation on base location. Visuals are uploading now
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xCin02Subtitle: *Field, please verify status of Toxin Production facilities
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xCin03Subtitle: *Then we have a go upon presentation of final clearance code
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xCin04Subtitle: *Roger that, Alpha Whiskey Echo, the birds are in the air
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xCin06Subtitle: *Clearance code is Sierra, Hotel, Oscar, Charlie Kilo
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva01Subtitle: *Phase one of our operation has been completed General. Our Tomahawk Missile strike was successful in destroying all of GLA's Toxin production facilities. Only their main base and Toxin Missile silo's remain to be eliminated
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva02Subtitle: *General, we've tracked Dr. Thrax to this remote location. He is in posession of chemical tipped missiles, and has them prepped for launch. Destroying his toxin storage tanks has slowed him down, but we must move in and secure those missiles before they can be launched
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva03Subtitle: *General, Dr. Thrax was able to develop small quantities of his new toxin. Make sure your forces are on high alert
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva04Subtitle: *General, due to the civilian presence in this location you will need to use ground forces to assault the final base and capture the 4 toxin missile sites in the area. Our successful liberation of the oil sites in Amisbad has provided us with additional resources for this operation
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva05Subtitle: *Dr. Thrax must be defeated so he can't inflict further terror on the world. General, you must stop him
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva06Subtitle: *Our Intel indicates that this is the best area to build your base. Local unrest may be in your favor. Good luck
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva07Subtitle: *General, the local GLA have responded to your rescue and have given us control of their base. You may now use their forces in your attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva08Subtitle: *General, your main objective is to capture the 4 Toxin Missile Silo's targeted on US major metropolitan areas before they launch
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva09Subtitle: *General, infrared scans of the area indicate that they are preparing to launch the Toxin Missiles
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva10Subtitle: *Missile launch in 5 minutes... Your final offensive should commence now
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva14Subtitle: *Missile launch in 1 minute... We must move in now!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva15Subtitle: *30 seconds until missile lauch... It's almost too late General!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva18Subtitle: *Toxin Missile Impact has been detected and Hot Zone is now confirmed. The casualties are incalculable General, we have failed
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva19Subtitle: *The first Missile Silo has been captured and the HazMat decontamination team is en-route. One to go General
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva20Subtitle: *Good job, sir. The second Missile Silo has been captured. Two to go
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva21Subtitle: *Good job, sir. The third Missile Silo has been captured. One to go
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva22Subtitle: *Great work, General. We now have control of all 4 Toxin Missile silo's. The operation is a success
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva23Subtitle: *Toxin breach, you have 2 minutes to guide the Bio-engineer to the hot zone to neutralize the threat
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva24Subtitle: *We have a green light for the operation. Launch the attack on GLA's perimeter base
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva25Subtitle: *Intel says that the Missile Sites we are looking for are in this region. Use caution and make sure those toxins aren't released
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva26Subtitle: *Infantry won't work well here, General. Our enemy is using toxins in almost every weapon that they throw at us
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva27Subtitle: *General, your objective is to capture this structure, not destroy it! If those toxins are released then the region will be contaminated for 100 square miles!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva28Subtitle: *General, our intel indicates that if we can leak the napalm in those tanks into those nearby tunnels exits we can flood their whole system
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva29Subtitle: *Congratulations General. Dr. Thrax won't be poisoning the world with his creations any longer
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva30Subtitle: *Now that Dr. Thrax is defeated we can finally bring our boys home. Good work, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva31Subtitle: *We have a green light on Operation: Eagle's Strike. Launch the attack on Toxin Production facilities
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva32Subtitle: *General, your orders are to build a base to attack the Toxin General. As as your forces are ready then capture the enemies 4 Toxin Missile sites before they can launch
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva33Subtitle: *General, the GLA base to the east has decided to Rebel against the Toxin General and his mass use of toxins. They wish to aid us in our attack against the General by giving us use of their base
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva34Subtitle: *General, the enemy has detected our presence in their main base and have begun launch preparations for the Toxin Missiles. The should have launch capability in approximately 30 minutes. Intel has located and revelaed the 4 missile sites on your radar screen
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xEva35Subtitle: *General, Intel puts some of the Missiles in this region. Take care not to release the toxin!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xThrax01Subtitle: *You are too late infidel, the launch is commencing to cleanse your lands in pestilence. Hahahaha...
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xThrax02Subtitle: *Your betrayal has not gone unnoticed. You will burn with the infidels you now assist. May your sons camels swell with virulence!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA05xThrax03Subtitle: *My reach is long and now you will feel my wrath! Die infidel dogs, die!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA06Crusader202Subtitle: *They're too well dug in! We need reinforcements!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA07Crusader204Subtitle: *We've broken through to the north! Send reinforcements
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA07Crusader301Subtitle: *Be advised, car bombs in the area
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA07Crusader303Subtitle: *We've crossed the bridge. Sweep and clear
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA07Officer01Subtitle: *We've got to clear the area! Destroy everything!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA07Officer02Subtitle: *Destroy everything not American. Leave nothing behind!
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA07Officer03Subtitle: *Copy that Delta two. Your orders are to fall back. Over
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA08Chatter06Subtitle: *This is Echo one rolling into hot zone. Everyone keep your eyes open
DIALOGEVENT:MisUSA08Cin03Subtitle: *Looks like the whole GLA is lining up for us today
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi001Subtitle: *So, I see you have decided to stay and stand against me. You will regret that decision, General. Prepare to meet your end!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi002Subtitle: *The tiger stands poised to strike, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi004Subtitle: *My forces are ready to engage your defenses, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi005Subtitle: *Feel the stomping feet of my iron dragon!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi006Subtitle: *Your defenses are worthless against my forces
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi007Subtitle: *Now we meet in the field of honor, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi008Subtitle: *This we do for the good of China
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi009Subtitle: *It is time to test your steel, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi010Subtitle: *You have attacked me for the last time, General. This wave will break your defenses and crush your pitiful army to dust!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi011Subtitle: *The might of China falls upon you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi012Subtitle: *Your inferior forces will provide no challenge for my warriors
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi013Subtitle: *You began this fight, General. No I will finish it
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi015Subtitle: *Two warriors meet on the battlefield. Who is to say who will win? I do, that's who. Me. You will fall, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi016Subtitle: *A fight that cannot be won is not worth fighting. So why are you here, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi017Subtitle: *Rage will only get you so far, General. Now, rage and a column of tanks...that will get you somewhere
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi018Subtitle: *You find yourself at the end of your rope, General. And only now have you discovered that the end of that rope is on fire
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi019Subtitle: *The dance of battle is strange and brief... and this battle with you has been strangely brief
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi020Subtitle: *I see you haven't thought your strategy through. Pity
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi022Subtitle: *You are not acting for the good of you people, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi023Subtitle: *I will give you a moments pause to consider your next move
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi024Subtitle: *A wise man knows when to retreat. Obviously you are not such a man
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi025Subtitle: *In the end, all fall before me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi027Subtitle: *China cannot be defeated by one man
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi028Subtitle: *We shall mediate and consider our next move
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi029Subtitle: *Do not commit to a tactic you cannot support
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi031Subtitle: *We sweep away your buildings like bamboo before a hurricane
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi032Subtitle: *Your men ran from the Barracks as we knocked it to the ground
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi033Subtitle: *A factory cannot produce war, General--and now your War Factory produces nothing
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi034Subtitle: *Your Air Field has been grounded, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi035Subtitle: *Your base defenses fall before us like blades of grass
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi036Subtitle: *We've destroyed your Command Center, so where are you hiding now, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi037Subtitle: *So many of your buildings have fallen that I would have expected you to surrender by now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi038Subtitle: *Don't think you can destroy my Barracks without feeling my wraith, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi039Subtitle: *I'll have to rebuild that War Factory now. You would be wise to exploit my momentary weakness... it won't last
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi040Subtitle: *Dozers: Rebuild the Air Field before our MiGs return!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi041Subtitle: *Our defenses are cracking! Repel the invaders!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi042Subtitle: *That is quite enough destruction, General. Now it is my turn
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi043Subtitle: *You can claim my Command Center, but this battle isn't over, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi044Subtitle: *We will avenge all those MiGs you've destroyed, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi045Subtitle: *The price of this war is too high, General. Now it is time for you to pay
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi046Subtitle: *China's infantry is plentiful, but too many have been sacrificed. Now I will return your cruelty ten-fold
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi047Subtitle: *Capture all the oil you wish--you will not have time to reap the rewards
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi048Subtitle: *That Artillery Platform can easily be avoided, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi049Subtitle: *Seeking to increase your efficiency with that Oil Refinery, General? A solid strategy would have servered you better
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi050Subtitle: *Something stirs at the edge of my base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi051Subtitle: *I see you approaching my base, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi052Subtitle: *You will not live to regret entering my base, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi053Subtitle: *You forces may enter my base, but they will never leave again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi054Subtitle: *Those resources are under my protection, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi055Subtitle: *Why do you insist on attacking from the flanks?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi056Subtitle: *Interesting attack, General, but it will not succeed against me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi057Subtitle: *A brave attack, General, but bravery alone will not defeat me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi059Subtitle: *Leave this place before you anger me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi060Subtitle: *I can see what you are doing, General. I will not allow it
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi061Subtitle: *Run away from here, General, before I unleash the horde on you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi062Subtitle: *We are approaching your base, General. What is your defense?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi063Subtitle: *Are you prepared for our attack, General? We shall see
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi065Subtitle: *Now we will begin leveling your base, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi067Subtitle: *I claim this Oil Derrick for China
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi068Subtitle: *Your flanks are exposed, General. Fatal mistake
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi069Subtitle: *You have allowed my forces to subvert your defenses. Now we will finish you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi070Subtitle: *You have allowed your power to drop, General. Pray that isn't a fatal mistake
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi071Subtitle: *Without power you won't be able to defend your base, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi072Subtitle: *You have exhausted your resources, General. It is time to admit defeat
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi073Subtitle: *You have taxed my resources, General. Now I will come and take yours
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi074Subtitle: *The Scud Strom is a cowardly weapon, General. I thought more of you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi075Subtitle: *You are forcing me to answer with a Nuclear Silo of my own, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi076Subtitle: *That Particle Cannon is a formidable weapon, but it cannot stop China
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi077Subtitle: *So many defenses... I see you have proper respect for your enemy
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi078Subtitle: *You cannot build more tanks than China, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi079Subtitle: *We will match you planes in the air, General. Your superiority will be only in your mind
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi080Subtitle: *Your men are outnumbered, General. Do not try to make a greater horde than China
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi081Subtitle: *Your base grows large, General... ripe for a nuclear strike
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi083Subtitle: *We are immune to your nuclear missiles, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi084Subtitle: *No! Your particle beam will only injure us--we will not forget this, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi085Subtitle: *Hide in those buildings, General. Perhaps a Dragon Tank will come to visit you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi086Subtitle: *Colonel Burton's exploits are legendary, but he is only one man, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi087Subtitle: *I see you have corrupted one of our Black Lotus agents. Her training will not turn the battle to your favor, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi088Subtitle: *The sniper Kell enters our battle. Do not count on his stealth to save you, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi089Subtitle: *You are foolish to build an Air Field, General. Only tanks can save you from me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi090Subtitle: *You are wise to build a War Factory, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi091Subtitle: *That Barracks is only the beginning of what you will need to defeat me, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi092Subtitle: *If you are going to sell your buildings, why do you bother constructing them?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi093Subtitle: *You will not defeat me this easily, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi095Subtitle: *I will not be beaten by the likes of you, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi096Subtitle: *This is not the end, General. I will recover from this
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi097Subtitle: *I must acknowledge this defeat. You have shown superior tactics, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi098Subtitle: *My superior tactics are leading to your defeat, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi099Subtitle: *You are losing this battle, General. Better to accept defeat honorably than to fight on
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi100Subtitle: *The end is drawing near for you, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi101Subtitle: *Why do you resist the inevitable, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi102Subtitle: *The shadow of the dragon signals the beginning of your defeat, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi103Subtitle: *It is time to accept your defeat, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi104Subtitle: *It is time for the dragon to rise again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi105Subtitle: *There is no shame in accepting your weakness
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi106Subtitle: *You are not ready to face me. Return when your training is complete
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi107Subtitle: *Why do you run towards your own demise?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi108Subtitle: *This has been an interesting contest. Perhaps you will challenge me again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi109Subtitle: *Improve your skills and challenge me again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi110Subtitle: *Welcome, General. I hope you are prepared to face me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi111Subtitle: *Your victories speak well of your abilty, but my generals did not have my cunning or experience
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossChi112Subtitle: *Soon you will see what it is to face the dragon
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA001Subtitle: *Most enemies would have flee from the sight of my armies. Perhaps this will be worthwhile after all
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA002Subtitle: *My forces descend on you like the wind, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA003Subtitle: *Your men are like sheep before my warriors
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA004Subtitle: *Look at all the wonderful toys you have brought to me. I broke all my toys as a child, General, and now I will break yours
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA005Subtitle: *Your forces fall like wheat before my sword
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA006Subtitle: *You have done well against my Generals, but I have all of their power combined. What will you do against that, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA007Subtitle: *You will never even see my forces, General... until it is too late
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA008Subtitle: *We will sweep you from our lands, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA009Subtitle: *Now you will see what your useless invasion has brought you, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA010Subtitle: *You have dared to challenge me--now you will reap the terrible reward
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA011Subtitle: *How do you feel, General, as the horsemen ride to your doorstep?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA012Subtitle: *You've had your chance to retreat, now we will annihilate you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA013Subtitle: *Bear witness to the power of my will, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA014Subtitle: *My rage will tear your war-machine to dust
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA015Subtitle: *Toxin... explosives... stealth... Any one of these you have defeated, but all three? All is lost, General. You should surrender... for the good of your men
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA016Subtitle: *Your world has made you soft, General. Mine has made me strong...
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA017Subtitle: *You will learn to respect my power, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA018Subtitle: *You will pause while I build my next attack, then the battle will resume
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA019Subtitle: *Have you grown tired dying against my defenses, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA020Subtitle: *The battlefield is quiet, General. Are you waiting for me to finish this?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA021Subtitle: *We await your next pathetic attack with great anticipation
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA022Subtitle: *Has this been the extent of your power, General? Truly pathetic
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA023Subtitle: *Your attacks have been like pathetic screams amidst the howl of a raging storm
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA024Subtitle: *This battle is beginning to bore me, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA025Subtitle: *How much longer should I let you live, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA026Subtitle: *General, my subject require my attention... how much longer do you intend to dance around like a clown?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA027Subtitle: *General, your tactics remind me of a child learning to play chess
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA028Subtitle: *Are you done, General? Have you exhausted your pathetic resources?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA029Subtitle: *General, I was bored minutes ago--now I'm beginning to fall asleep
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA030Subtitle: *How does it feel to challenge a true military genius?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA032Subtitle: *Now your Barracks falls--soon all shall fall
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA033Subtitle: *Your War Factory is lost--rebuild it and I'll destroy it again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA034Subtitle: *I have relieved you of your Air Field, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA035Subtitle: *Your base defenses cannot stop my forces, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA036Subtitle: * General, if you cannot even hold on to your Command Center, how do you hope to defeat me?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA037Subtitle: *So many of your structures have fallen, General--why not retreat the field and spare yourself any further embarrassment?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA038Subtitle: *Do not test my patience further by destroying any more of my Oil Derricks, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA039Subtitle: *You dare to destroy my Barracks, General?!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA040Subtitle: *General, I require an Arms Dealer to do my business. Do not destroy another one
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA041Subtitle: *You think to crush my defenses, General? More will rise in their place
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA042Subtitle: *That is the last building you will destroy, General. My patience has limits
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA043Subtitle: *My Command Center! You have forced me to retreat underground, but this isn't over yet, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA044Subtitle: *You have destroyed many of my machine, General. Perhaps I underestimated you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA045Subtitle: *My men are not targets for your practice, General. Their blood is on your hands
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA046Subtitle: *Release my Oil Derrick or I will burn it down
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA047Subtitle: *I see you've captured that derelict Artillery Platform. Best of luck making it work
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA048Subtitle: *That Oil Refinery will not turn the tide to your favor, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA049Subtitle: *Impudent fool! You have invaded into my home far enough
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA050Subtitle: *You are like a stinging insect, General, and it is time to squash your annoying presence
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA051Subtitle: *The enemy is in our presence! Destroy him! Destroy them all!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA052Subtitle: *Fool! You have crossed the line! Your forces are forfeit!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA053Subtitle: *Ah, a flanking attack... crude, but at least it is a strategy
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA055Subtitle: *A frontal attack? You should have brought more forces
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA056Subtitle: *I see you've found my extra supplies... and I stress, my extra supplies. Leave them now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA057Subtitle: *Approaching my base from that path will only lead you to death
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA058Subtitle: *Stay out of that village, General. I protect those under my care
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA059Subtitle: *Those resources are for my people, General. They are not your for the taking
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA060Subtitle: *Those buildings were not placed here for your use, General. Do not disrupt my infrastructure
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA061Subtitle: *It seems you appetite has overstretched your resources, General. I hope you get your power back up before we reach your base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA062Subtitle: *Our land is without power... too bad your base cannot run without its dependence
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA064Subtitle: *General, you are taxing my resources. Your little war will cause my people to go hungry
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA065Subtitle: *A Scud Storm?! You have stolen our technology! You will pay for this, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA066Subtitle: *Building nuclear weapons, General? I figured you would resort to such cowardice
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA067Subtitle: *Particle Cannon? Your beams from space cannot reach us beneath the earth
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA068Subtitle: *So many base defenses. You must truly fear my power, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA069Subtitle: *How many tanks do you require, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA070Subtitle: *You fill the air with those annoying gnats. Now we will swat them down
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA071Subtitle: *Train all the men you wish, General, but the loss of life will only grow greater by the minute
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA072Subtitle: *Your base has grown large, General... perhaps too large
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA073Subtitle: *Launch your toxins at us, General; we have prepared for much worse
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA075Subtitle: *Yes, use your particle beam--show the world your cowardice
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA076Subtitle: *Garrison the building, General--hide like rats in a wall
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA077Subtitle: *Colonel Burton will not save you, General. You'll have to fight this war yourself
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA078Subtitle: *Ah, the beautiful Black Lotus. Join me, Lotus, and you could like as a queen
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA079Subtitle: *Jarmen Kell? He dares to stand against me?! My vengence will be most... unpleasant
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA080Subtitle: *Your Air Field will not stand against my assault, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA081Subtitle: *Finally built a War Factory, eh General? What took you so long?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA082Subtitle: *Your pathetic Barracks will be of no use to you, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA083Subtitle: *Selling off your buildings to fund your army? Hardly seems logical, does it, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA084Subtitle: *This is impossible! You cannot defeat me!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA085Subtitle: *You may think you have the upper-hand, but this battle will turn like the wind
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA086Subtitle: *Your soldiers may outnumber mine now, but battles are won by more than numbers, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA087Subtitle: *I can't believe that I'm being beaten by such a weak-minded fool. The shame will mark me forever
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA088Subtitle: *Defeated by a fool... the humiliation is too great to bear... please leave me to my torment
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA089Subtitle: *General, I smell the stench of fear and desperation coming from you base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA090Subtitle: * I sense the time of your demise growing near, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA091Subtitle: *Your forces are beginning to be overrun, General. Soon they will be my prisoners
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA092Subtitle: *We are kicking you like a wounded goat, General. Admit defeat to spare your agony
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA093Subtitle: *You are defeated. This is what happens to all who stand against me , General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA094Subtitle: *You are a fool to challenge me, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA095Subtitle: *All the powers of the GLA are at my disposal
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA096Subtitle: *I am more dangerous than all my three Generals combined
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA097Subtitle: *You have won, General. Why do you continue to torture me by examining these statistics?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA098Subtitle: *Yes, you can now see why you have lost... the numbers speak for themselves
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA099Subtitle: *You have traveled far and faced many opponents to reach me General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA100Subtitle: *I commend your efforts, but they have wholly unprepared you for what you are about to face
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA101Subtitle: *You have faced Dr. Thrax's toxic warriors; Kassad's stealth legions and Juhziz's demolitions, but I taught them all in the art of war
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA102Subtitle: *This will be your final battle, General. May whatever gods you pray to have mercy on you... because I will not
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossGLA103Subtitle: *This will be your final battle, General. Make your peace and prepare for the end
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA001Subtitle: *Well, there you are. Too late to run now, Boy
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA002Subtitle: *I hope you're ready, cause we're coming for ya
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA003Subtitle: *Set the table, Kid, cause we're coming for dinner
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA004Subtitle: *I've got three things to teach you, Kid: How to lose; how to cry; and how to die
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA005Subtitle: *We're coming to attack soon, so get out all your white flags
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA006Subtitle: *Here we come, Kid... try not to wet yourself, okay?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA008Subtitle: *Ooh, you're going to get it now, Kid
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA009Subtitle: *You ready? Cause here comes a tactic you may have learned in school. You ready to go back to school?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA010Subtitle: *It's time for me to teach you a thing or two about the back of my hand
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA011Subtitle: *You should have run when you had the chance. Now I'm going to teach you the meaning of respect
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA012Subtitle: *So, about your funeral... open casket or closed?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA013Subtitle: *I'm gonna march into your base and plant my foot in your butt, <sarcastic> \"General.\
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA014Subtitle: *Here we come, Punk--step aside or get stepped on
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA015Subtitle: *You call yourself a \"General\"? I call you a pain in the butt, is what I call you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA016Subtitle: *This is your idea of strategy? Of tactics? \"Tank blob\" is the best you can come up with? Pathetic... just pathetic...
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA017Subtitle: *Yeah, I've read Sun Tzu too, Sport: \"Greater enemy--retreat. Smaller enemy--attack.\" Is that all you got for me?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA018Subtitle: *So, where's your army, Boy? Or did you just want to bare-knuckle it? Cause I'll slap you down with my bare hands if you want. You want a piece of that, Boy?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA019Subtitle: *You got me out of bed for this? I aught to take you over my knee right now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA020Subtitle: *I got more medals than you've got teeth, Boy... which won't be saying much after I get done knocking them out for you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA021Subtitle: *Are you putting all of your defenses at the front of your base? You don't think we can go around that? Well, do you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA022Subtitle: *Boy, you think I'm playing with you? You better think again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA023Subtitle: *Better check your flanks there, Partner; I think some of my troops just snuck into your base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA024Subtitle: *Do you think this is a game? Well do you? Wait, don't answer that
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA025Subtitle: *Kid, who taught you military tactics? Huh? Cause you should go slap him square in the mouth, I tell you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA026Subtitle: *I have the whole United States military behind me, Son, and I've just decided that we don't like you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA027Subtitle: *Is this tactic of yours supposed to be some kind of joke I'm not aware of?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA028Subtitle: *So, you're not a real general, are you? You're like the Surgeon General or something like that, right?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA029Subtitle: *Does your mommy know you're out by yourself?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA030Subtitle: *You can tell me.. We're just Generals here... Do your men know you're incompetent?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA031Subtitle: *Did you know you just lost a Tech Building, Sport?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA032Subtitle: *Just blew-up your Barracks, Skippy. What you gonna do about it?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA033Subtitle: *There goes your War Factory. You mad yet, Boy?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA034Subtitle: *I don't know why you bothered to build that Air Field if you aren't going to protect it
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA035Subtitle: *Who put these base defenses down like this? They can't defend anything like that
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA036Subtitle: *I should let you build another Command Center just so I could knock it down again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA037Subtitle: *I feel like I'm kicking over sand castles. How many of your buildings you gonna let me destroy there, Sport?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA038Subtitle: *I let you have that Tech Building, Boy. I don't need it to beat you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA039Subtitle: *Kid, that Barracks was not a military target. Do that again and this will get ugly
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA040Subtitle: *You better stand down, Son--I'm not going to stand for you blowing-up my War Factories, you hear?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA041Subtitle: *Do you know how much those jets cost? I coulda fed the whole world with what you just destroyed
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA042Subtitle: *Cracking my defenses, huh? Well, go on--it should be me just enough time to overrun your base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA043Subtitle: *That's enough buildings, Son. Why don't you try attacking my forces now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA044Subtitle: *My Command Center?! You think I'm just going to sit here and take that?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA045Subtitle: *You had best leave my pilots alone, Boy. Planes are one thing, but you let my pilots return safe, you hear?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA046Subtitle: *You're a sneaky little 'cuss, aren't you? But I think that's enough of my vehicles destroyed, don't you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA047Subtitle: *Let's get armor and air support out there--our grunts are getting torn apart!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA048Subtitle: *Let that Oil Derrick go, Boy. This war ain't about the price of gas you know
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA049Subtitle: *Think you know how to use that Artillery Platform, Son?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA050Subtitle: *That Oil Refinery is not a viable target, Son. And it don't belong to you, so we're coming to get it back
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA051Subtitle: *Well, you managed to get to my side of the map. Didn't think you had it in ya
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA052Subtitle: *You planning to attack, or you just going to stand out there all day?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA053Subtitle: *You'll get out of my base if you know what's good for you, Boy
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA054Subtitle: *Enemy's in our perimeter--all forces repell the invaders
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA055Subtitle: *Those ain't your supplies, Sport. Best to step-off now, before you get hurt
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA056Subtitle: *A flanking attack?! Don't make me laugh, Boy
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA057Subtitle: *Trying to attack from my back-door? Good luck with that
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA058Subtitle: *You coming to attack me, Boy? Nice to see you have some guts
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA059Subtitle: *Get away from my Tech buildings, if you know what's good for you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA060Subtitle: *My forces have your base in sight, Kid. What you gonna do now?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA061Subtitle: *Here comes the hammer, Punk, and you don't want to be the nail
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA063Subtitle: *Things are about to get real bad for you, Sport. Don't say I didn't warn you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA064Subtitle: *So, here's where you're hiding your resources. Mind if I take a few?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA066Subtitle: *Maybe we'll come in your back-door. Whadda you think about that?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA067Subtitle: *Look out, we're coming through the front-door!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA070Subtitle: *What did you plan to do without power? I can't wait to see this strategy
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA071Subtitle: *You better pay you power bill or we're going to have to postpone this fight
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA072Subtitle: *You're out of resources? Boy, you don't start the dance if you can't pay the bill
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA073Subtitle: *Uh-oh, looks like we're going to have to do some deficit spending
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA074Subtitle: *Built yourself a Scud Storm there? You can't hit the side of a barn with a scud, don't you know that?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA075Subtitle: *Bringing out your nukes, huh? If Washington hadn't tied my hands, I'd show you some nukes, I tell you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA076Subtitle: *How'd you get a Particle Cannon, Son? That's supposed to me top-secret
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA077Subtitle: *So many base defenses. I can just smell the fear coming off you, Boy
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA078Subtitle: *Oh, look at this... here comes the tank blob. Not gonna work against me, Son
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA079Subtitle: *That's a lot of expensive planes you're putting in the air, Kid. Sure you wanna spend that money?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA080Subtitle: *Hope all those grunts know what you're getting them into
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA081Subtitle: *That's a lot of buildings, Son. You know that buildings can't fight for you, right?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA082Subtitle: *Bring the scuds, Punk--I'll show you the storm
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA083Subtitle: *You're going to regret nuking me, Kid. I don't take kindly to that
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA084Subtitle: *Using a particle beam, eh? You better put me away with that cause you won't like my counter-attack
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA085Subtitle: *You know, only a coward fights from inside buildings. You know that, right?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA086Subtitle: *Welcome, Colonel Burton. Sorry you had to get tied up in this thing. No hard feelings
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA087Subtitle: *Black Lotus ain't your salvation, Boy. She ain't gonna get anywhere near my base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA088Subtitle: *Jarmen Kell's just another sniper, Punk. I've got dozens of snipers
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA089Subtitle: *Yeah, build your Air Field--get some birds in the air. May be your only shot a stopping me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA090Subtitle: *Only one War Factroy? It's gonna take at least half-a-dozen to stop me, Kid
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA091Subtitle: *Is that Barracks a little close to the front-lines, Kid? Hard to sleep with bullets in your barracks
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA092Subtitle: *Don't just sell one building, Boy--sell them all and hope that I don't come for you anyway
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA093Subtitle: *Don't get cocky, Boy--this ain't over yet
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA094Subtitle: *You may think you have the upper-hand, but I've got a few tricks left in me. You'll see
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA095Subtitle: *I've dug myself outta worse holes than this, Punk. You ain't gonna win that easily
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA096Subtitle: *You think you're beating me? You best think again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA097Subtitle: *Huh... I guess it's over. Nice work, Kid. I guess you took me down a peg or two
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA098Subtitle: *Can you feel my fist starting to close around your neck, Punk?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA099Subtitle: *Don't take losing to me so hard--everyone loses to me, Kid
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA100Subtitle: *Give me a sec to get some tanks together and I'll end this little skirmish
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA101Subtitle: *Why don't you just give up now, <sarcastic> \"General.\
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA102Subtitle: *Boy, I beat you like an old drum. Who gave you a command? Cause I've got some word for them
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA103Subtitle: *Don't click that button unless you're serious, Boy
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA104Subtitle: *You wanna tangle with me? I think you better think again, Kid
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA105Subtitle: *Don't bring that attitude in here unless you can back it up, Punk
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA107Subtitle: *Maybe you could make a few extra bucks polishing my boots, cause you sure ain't no general
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_BossUSA109Subtitle: *I ain't gonna give no speeches, so let's just get this on
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo001Subtitle: *I have some surprises for you, General. Why don't you come out and play?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo002Subtitle: *Now that the field is covered with explosives, I suppose we'll attack
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo003Subtitle: *General, I have a delivery for you... sign for it, won't you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo004Subtitle: *Careful, who knows when Jarmen Kell will sneak into your base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo005Subtitle: *Did your building just blow up? Hmm... I wonder how that happened?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo006Subtitle: *All of my forces are packed with explosives, General. I wouldn't shoot at them if I were you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo007Subtitle: *My Terrorists have learned to disguise themselves as... oops, have I said too much?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo008Subtitle: *You might notice that my explosives pack a bit more punch... I hope you appreciate our attention to quality
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo009Subtitle: *Look how quickly the Scud Launcher destoys a building now... just wait, it's amazing
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo010Subtitle: *First, all is silence... then \"boom!\"... ahh... don't you just love it, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo011Subtitle: *I rarely attack, you should feel honored
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo013Subtitle: *My troops are coming to assault your base... make them feel welcome
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo014Subtitle: *Please ignore my workers, General; they're just burying some... umm... garbage for me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo015Subtitle: *Oh, General, you must see this... it's the bomb. <childish laugh>
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo016Subtitle: *We're going out for more explosives, General. Be right back
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo017Subtitle: *It's quiet out there, General. You know what quiet means, right? BOOM!!!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo018Subtitle: *I am the master of explosives, General. You have no defense against me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo019Subtitle: *Your base has been targeted for demolition
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo020Subtitle: *Do you fear my next attack, General? You should
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo021Subtitle: *As we speak my agents are sneaking into your base and planting explosives
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo022Subtitle: *Your building could be wired to explode right now. You'll never know until it's too late
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo023Subtitle: *There are few units that can detect my demolitions... do you know which ones they are?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo024Subtitle: *Demo Traps are difficult to construct, General. To appreciate their beauty you have to see one up close
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo025Subtitle: *How are you enjoying my tricks and traps so far?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo027Subtitle: *We've destroyed your Barracks... I hope no one was in there
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo028Subtitle: *Your War Factory has fallen, General. Build another one so we can knock it down again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo029Subtitle: *Air Fields are so fragile--it's hardly even fun to destroy them
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo030Subtitle: *Your base defenses cannot take my explosives, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo031Subtitle: *Ah, there's nothing quite like destroying a Command Center
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo032Subtitle: *We've destroyed so many of your buildings, General... I appreaciate you building more for our ammusement
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo033Subtitle: *You've destroyed our Oil Derrick. Now you're getting into the spirit of things
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo034Subtitle: *My Barracks! Many of my demolitions were in there, General. I'll make you pay for this
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo035Subtitle: *Not my War Factory! General, this annoy habit you've developed cannot continue
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo036Subtitle: *Not to worry, my base defenses are only an early-warning signal. Now you must walk through my true defenses
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo037Subtitle: *Too many! You've destroy too many of my structures, General. Now the fighting gets dirty
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo038Subtitle: *We will rebuild that Command Center, General, and you will play for this transgression
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo039Subtitle: *General, how do you expect me to defeat you if you keep destroying my vehicles?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo040Subtitle: *You're cutting my men down before they can place their demolitions... that doesn't seem right, does it, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo041Subtitle: *Ah yes, capture that Oil Derrick, General. Then we'll have more to destroy
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo042Subtitle: *General, why do you want that Artillery Platform?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo043Subtitle: *Good, General, capture the Oil Refinery... they blow-up so dramatically
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo044Subtitle: *Be careful, General--your men have just enter the danger zone around my base. Even I don't remember where all the traps are set out there
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo045Subtitle: *General, your men are coming dangerously close to my base. I'd turn back if I were you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo046Subtitle: *Get out of my base, General. This whole area is wired with exploses, and I'm not afraid to use them
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo047Subtitle: *You fool! Do you know how many explosives are surrounding your men right now?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo048Subtitle: *Attacking from the flank, General? There might be few defenses there, but what about traps?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo049Subtitle: *The back of my base is particularly nasty, General. I wouldn't recommend an assault from there
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo050Subtitle: *A frontal assault?! You are more of a fool than I thought, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo051Subtitle: *There is nothing in this valley for you except death
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo052Subtitle: *Careful, General; this looks like a good place for an ambush... oops, too late
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo053Subtitle: *You think I didn't prepare for you coming here, General? Fool
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo054Subtitle: *Those are my resources, General. Go find your own
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo055Subtitle: *General, you've entered my demolitions storage facility. One false move and we all die
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo056Subtitle: *Ah, I see we hit one of your power lines. I hope your power isn't out for too long
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo057Subtitle: *Your dependency on electricity will be you undoing, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo058Subtitle: *Your resources are exhausted, General. My forces are circling for the kill
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo059Subtitle: *My resources are low, General. Mind if we come take some of yours?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo060Subtitle: *A Scud Storm... I see... Well, perhaps it is time to build one of my own
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo061Subtitle: *I wonder how many explosives it will take to destroy that Nuclear Silo?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo062Subtitle: *Now why do you want to build a Particle Cannon? We were just beginning to have fun, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo063Subtitle: *So many base defenses, General. How do you expect my bombers to enter your base now?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo064Subtitle: *Tanks... so many tanks. I'll enjoy watching your tanks hit my traps, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo065Subtitle: *Stop building planes, General... you'll miss the genius of my traps
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo066Subtitle: *With that many infantry you're sure to set-off my Demo Traps. I'd tell them to spread out when crossing the field, General... or not
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo067Subtitle: *So many buildings... Your base is a perfect target for my explosives, General. Thank you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo068Subtitle: *Foolish move, General. Your Scud Storm won't stop me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo069Subtitle: *Nuclear missile! You will pay for this, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo070Subtitle: *No! That particle beam will set off my explosives!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo071Subtitle: *Yes, garrison that building, General--it probably doesn't have explosives attached to it
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo072Subtitle: *Hello, Colonel Burton. Try not to step on any traps
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo073Subtitle: *Black Lotus... just because you can detect my traps do not think I am now vulnerable
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo074Subtitle: *Why would you send Jarmen Kell against me, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo075Subtitle: *Do not build any more Air Fields, General... I don't like them
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo076Subtitle: *The War Factory builds vehicles... vehicles that will set-off my Demo Traps
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo077Subtitle: *Do you think it is wise to build a Barracks, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo078Subtitle: *Please, General, don't sell-off what I could destroy for you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo079Subtitle: *General, you're not playing fair. Now go step on some traps
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo080Subtitle: *You're exceptionally lucky, General, but you can't avoid my Demo Traps forever
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo081Subtitle: *No one has beaten my traps, General, and you won't be the first... you'll see
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo082Subtitle: *Do you think you're beating me, General? This could change in an instant--I don't fight fair
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo083Subtitle: *You may have defeated me, General, but Deathstrike will avenge me
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo084Subtitle: *Ha ha! Your troops are falling to my traps, General. Soon they'll all be gone
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo085Subtitle: *You're losing, General. My tactics elude you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo086Subtitle: *You'll never defeat me, General. You should leave before you get hurt
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo087Subtitle: *I have so many explosives left... more explosives than you have forces I'm afraid
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo089Subtitle: *I have just the thing. Let's go make war
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo090Subtitle: *Demolitions expert: How can I help you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo091Subtitle: *I wonder if I could wire that button to explode?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo092Subtitle: *Please, General--enter my battlefield... but watch where to step
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo093Subtitle: *You were lucky this time, General. You could never beat me again
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo094Subtitle: *You were not prepared for this kind of war. Try again, if you dare
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo095Subtitle: *Here we see the battlefield--open... untouched by battle... a blank slate for our little...
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo096Subtitle: *Now where did those Demo Traps come from?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Demo097Subtitle: *Perhaps I have a few cards hidden up my sleeve, but did you except any less from me, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger001Subtitle: *Hey, General, you ever seen a Raptor up close?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger002Subtitle: *Hey, General, did you see that Stealth Fighter?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger003Subtitle: *Birds' away! Let's go hunt some dozers!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger004Subtitle: *I'm done playing with you, General. (Announcing to his own forces) Everyone attack!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger005Subtitle: *Will you look at that... US military spending at its best
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger006Subtitle: *(Singing... badly)... and the rockets' red glare, the bombs bursting in air...
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger007Subtitle: *Here comes the rain of terror, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger008Subtitle: *How are you enjoying the Shock-and-Awe, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger010Subtitle: *It doesn't seem fair, does it, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger011Subtitle: *It's time to pull the goalies. Everyone attack!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger013Subtitle: *It's awfully quiet out there... you didn't leave did you, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger014Subtitle: *Don't worry, General, this is just the quiet before the storm
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger015Subtitle: *I'd take this break to rebuild your defenses, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger016Subtitle: *Shh... did you hear that? I wouldn't worry, it's probably nothing
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger017Subtitle: *Sorry, General, we're just taking a lunch-break-be with you in a minute
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger018Subtitle: *You've forced me to use tanks... I hate using tanks
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger019Subtitle: *Having trouble crossing the river, General? Wanna lift?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger021Subtitle: *Stealth won't save you, General; we'll find you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger023Subtitle: *Huh, where are you going to train your troops now?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger024Subtitle: *Having trouble keeping up those defenses, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger025Subtitle: *You've lost a lot of buildings, General; were you planning on using harsh language now?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger030Subtitle: *This is General Granger to Aircraft Carrier Olympia: Send reinforcements... repeat: send reinforcements
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger031Subtitle: *They're attacking the Command Center! All forces, regroup!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger032Subtitle: *I don't appreciate you shooting down my planes, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger033Subtitle: *They're taking over our Oil Derricks! Rangers, get out there and take them back!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger036Subtitle: *The enemy's in our perimeter! All planes return to base!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger038Subtitle: *You're not stealing my supplies, are you, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger040Subtitle: *Hiding in the village, huh. That's a coward's tactic, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger041Subtitle: *Stop hiding, General. Don't make me come and get you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger046Subtitle: *Having trouble keeping your power up, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger047Subtitle: *Oops, your power's down - here come the bombs!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger048Subtitle: *Out of resources, General? Want to borrow some?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger049Subtitle: *Hey, General, how 'bout we call this one a draw?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger050Subtitle: *You may have won the battle, General, but the war is far from over
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger051Subtitle: *So, you built a Scud Storm. Think you can defend it?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger052Subtitle: *Hmm, that's a lot of anti-air, General Think it will be enough to calm the fear?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger053Subtitle: *Your tanks are no match for my planes, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger055Subtitle: *Garrison all the buildings you want, General-it won't help
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger056Subtitle: *How much more of this can you take, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger059Subtitle: *This battle is over, General-surrender or prepare to die!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger060Subtitle: *Not going to surrender, huh? Too bad
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger062Subtitle: *Come on, General--I'll show you the meaning of, \"Death from Above.\
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger064Subtitle: *I guess it's time for me to go find a good airline job
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger065Subtitle: *I win--you lose. What more is there to say?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger066Subtitle: *Be advised: This area is under the control fo Air Force General Malcolm Granger. Withdraw now or prepare to be bombed back to the stone-age
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger067Subtitle: *General, you're no match for me--I own the skies!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger068Subtitle: *Watch the skies, General; we're going to put on an air-show
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger071Subtitle: *You don't mind if we drop-in, do ya General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger072Subtitle: *That's two of my airfields you've hit, General. I'm starting to get annoyed
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger073Subtitle: *Curse you, General. If you hit another airfield I'll come for you personally
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger074Subtitle: *That's the last airfield you destroy today. (Announcing to his own troops) Forces, target their Command Center
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger075Subtitle: *I can't believe you beat me, General. I salute your superior tactics
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger076Subtitle: *It looks like you defeated me this time, General, but we'll meet again someday and I won't be so merciful because-
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger078Subtitle: *You don't think I'm going to let you keep that Scud Storm, do you?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger079Subtitle: *Another Scud Storm? I guess it's time to take the up a notch
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger081Subtitle: *So many Rangers-so few buildings to capture
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger082Subtitle: *General, do ya know how a Fuel-Air Bomb works? How 'bout a demonstration?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger083Subtitle: *Welcome to the party, Colonel Burton. You're in for it now, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger084Subtitle: *Do you know how to stop an A-10, General? Me neither
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger085Subtitle: *Hey, wanna see our new Bunker Buster?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger086Subtitle: *Artillery! You think you can attack me with artillery?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger087Subtitle: *You know that Scud Launcher is never going to make it to my base, right?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger088Subtitle: *Wait, that's a Bomb Truck! Everyone look out!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger089Subtitle: *You've forced me to use tanks... I hate using tanks
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger090Subtitle: *Having trouble crossing the river, General? Wanna lift?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger092Subtitle: *Stealth won't save you, General; we'll find you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Grainger093Subtitle: *Hmm, that's a lot of anti-air, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry001Subtitle: *So, this is where you're hiding, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry003Subtitle: *(Chinese infantry troops die) <angry voice> 1 billion more where that came from
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry004Subtitle: *(Paradrop)Like a swarm of locusts they decend from the sky to devour all those who stand against China
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry009Subtitle: *Don't worry General, we don't take prisoners
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry011Subtitle: *It's ok General, we've brought our own flag for your base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry012Subtitle: *Soon all your men will see are boots marching over them
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry015Subtitle: *Do you know how hard it is to feed a horde, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry016Subtitle: *I have enough men to hold a parade. Can we have it in your base?

DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry020Subtitle: *How long does it take for you to build your little tank force?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry021Subtitle: *<sarcastic> What tactic will you amaze me with now, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry022Subtitle: *This can't be the best you can do, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry024Subtitle: *You were not prepared for this challenge, were you, General?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry025Subtitle: *I have enough men to crush you without firing a shot
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry027Subtitle: *Aww... we've knocked over your little Tech Building. Boo-hoo
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry028Subtitle: *Now your Barracks is gone. How will you fight without men?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry029Subtitle: *Without a War Factory you'll have to fight me man-to-man, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry030Subtitle: *No more planes for you. Get on the ground and fight like a man
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry031Subtitle: *My men are marching right through you base defenses, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry032Subtitle: *There is only empty ground where your Command Center once stood, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry033Subtitle: *I have lost many men, General, but the cost to your buildings has been worth it
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry035Subtitle: *NO! Not my Barracks! We will build another, General... then you will pay
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry036Subtitle: *My War Factory is not essential to my victory, but do not destroy another
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry037Subtitle: *You have destroyed my Air Field! This is getting annoying, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry038Subtitle: *Destoy all the base defenses you want--they're only there to slow you down anyway
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry039Subtitle: *You have cost me many buildings, General. My men are coming to collect repayment
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry040Subtitle: *Nooo! They destroyed my Command Center! Go get them! Keep them away from me!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry041Subtitle: *Swat all the planes you like, General--we'll make more
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry042Subtitle: *My vehicles are not for your target practice, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry043Subtitle: *There are many more in my army ready to sacrifice for China, General. You won't stop us
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry044Subtitle: *I see you've captured my Oil Derrick, General. We are coming to take back China's oil now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry045Subtitle: *That old Artillery Platform is destoyed, General; you'll never get it to work
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry046Subtitle: *Do you think that Oil Refinery is just there for anyone to use? Return the refinery to me now
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry047Subtitle: *Get any closer to my base and I'll set the horde out on you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry048Subtitle: *I warn you, General, get away from my base. Do you know what a hundred men can do to a tank?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry049Subtitle: *They're in our base! Kill them! Get them out of here!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry051Subtitle: *General, get away from my resources--my men need those
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry052Subtitle: *General, do not try to flank my base
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry053Subtitle: *A back-door attack will not help you, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry054Subtitle: *Attacking the front of my base is foolish, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry055Subtitle: *Those are my Tech Buildings, General. Stay away
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry057Subtitle: *Crossing that bridge is a mistake, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry058Subtitle: *You've run out of power, General--your defenses are down and my men will invade soon
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry059Subtitle: *Without power you'll never stop my horde, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry060Subtitle: *You've wasted all your resources fighting my men... but I still have more men
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry061Subtitle: *We are out of resources! How did this happen?
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry062Subtitle: *Build your Scud Storm--it will only hit a few of my men... the rest will destroy you
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry063Subtitle: *I thought nuclear missile were not allowed! This is hardly fair, General
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry064Subtitle: *That Particle Cannon is useless against my horde!
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry065Subtitle: *Yes, you should build more base defenses--at least then you can stop the first wave of the charging horde
DIALOGEVENT:Taunts_Infantry066Subtitle: *Coward! You know that your tanks cannot crush my men, don't you?
